pageContent: Introduction: Vascular comorbidities (VC) (hypertension, diabetes, and hyperlipidemia) are known factors related to erectile dysfunction (ED) in men. However, no data are yet available for the effects of VC on ED incidence after prostate cancer radiotherapy (XRT).

metaData.source:
Sexual function with localized prostate cancer: active surveillance vs radical therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22260273/
